articles.summary: New research has uncovered the enormous financial potential of artificial intelligence (AI) to transform global healthcare systems. If implemented at scale, the findings suggest that AI could help healthcare for more than 2 billion people worldwide. The report is titled "The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Financial Systems in Healthcare: A Systematic Review of Economic Evaluation Studies"

articles.title: MAGA is split over the AI provision in Trump's Big Beautiful Bill
articles.author: system
articles.summary: The "Big Beautiful Bill" includes a provision that would effectively block states from regulating artificial intelligence for 10 years. It's controversial even among some of Trump's strongest supporters. "We have no idea what AI will be capable of in the next 10 years and giving it free rein and tying states hands is potentially dangerous"
